text: What is the purpose of a loss function in machine learning?
options: To measure the error of a model

text: What is overfitting in a machine learning model?
options: When the model performs well on training data but poorly on test data
When the model performs well on both training and test data
When the model performs poorly on training data

options: To split data into training and test sets
